hx046.01 Team Up: Robot Themed Team
Rarity: Rare
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Special Powers
TEAM UP: ROBOT THEMED TEAM: When establishing themed teams, friendly characters with the Robot keyword gain the Sentinel keyword. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).

There are a number of non-Robot keyword figs that have the Sentinel keyword. This card helps keep those characters on a themed team with Robots. Also, some effects look for the Sentinel keyword specifically.
